missionStatement: Empowering our fellow Lions with STEM opportunities
whatWeDo: The STEM Council was established by the Head of STEM to create a thriving ecosystem of events, activities, and resources for Lions at Earl of March. We organize and support the STEM community, connecting students with opportunities to explore their passions and discover new interests.
ourImpact: At Earl of March S.S. in Ontario, we're proud to support a diverse range of STEM programs including Computer Science, Computer Engineering, and more. Our council ensures that every Lion has the opportunity to explore what STEM truly means.
